name: Mountain Climbers
setup: Body in straight line from head to heels
steps: Drive right knee toward chest rapidly
Quickly switch legs, driving left knee to chest
Continue alternating legs in running motion
Keep hips level and core tight
cues: Drive knees to chest, not wide
Land softly on balls of feet
mistakes: Allowing hips to pike up high
Bouncing or swaying side to side
Driving knees out wide instead of forward
safety: Maintain strong plank position throughout. Stop if form deteriorates. Modify to step-ups if needed.

regressions: Step one foot forward at a time instead of jumping
Hands elevated on bench or step
Slower pace with emphasis on form

prescriptionHints.notes: High-intensity cardio movement. Focus on maintaining plank throughout.

joints.notes: Maintain neutral wrist position. Protect knees with controlled landings.
